title: The 7-Day Challenge That Changed My Life (You Can Do It Too!)
description:
Ready to change your life with a simple 15-minute habit? ğŸŒŸ Join me on a 7-day illustrated journaling challenge! Grab a pen, a sketchbook, and let's capture life's moments through words and drawings. No art skills required!

ğŸ‘‰ Prompts:
1. Breakfast
2. Outfit
3. Book/Music
4. Pet
5. Place I visited
6. Quiet moment
7. Bedtime
